docs.text: BluePark BluePark is an experimental lightweight ASGI web framework. Since BluePark is just an experiment for now, the API may change drastically over time. Docs: https://www.bluepark.io/ Running on development environment Clone the git repo. cd into project root and install dependencies using pipenv : pipenv install --dev Activate virtual python environment using pipenv shell Run the test code: python test.py
docs.title: Home
